extendedInfo.description: The duck season is open.Use the accelerometer or touchscreen to shoot the flying ducks and compete against hunters from all around the world.Have fun, and drop me a line if you like it.

reviews.title: Droid incredible
reviews.comment: Nice time killer, works fine on my phone. A bit more of a challenge than expected. Backgrounds are varied and of good quality. NO PHONE IDENTITY PERMISSION is a plus for me :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awsome!
reviews.comment: Best game ever! Best graphics! So intense, its like oh man am I going to shoot the duck?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: U slide the curser over a duck to shoot it. Stupid game and very bad graphics. If theres lots duck on screen u can slide your fingers through all of them and they\'ll be dead. Lame..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow
reviews.comment: It\'s slow and freezes up my droid >:-{

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Keeps kid occupied. Works fine HTC incredible2 lots bad reviews for good decent game that free...maybe u guys need beter devises or somethin also works great Droid2

reviews.title: Lil\'Jay
reviews.comment: Wow this game litlerly as soon ad i opened up the app completely shut my galaxy s mesmorize off!! Do not.download!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Quack quack
reviews.comment: Loved it. So easy to play, the sound effects were awesome, and the levels get harder as you would expect; cracked the last level, had a gold star on all, and 672460 points too!  ##Rating reduced as no reply to an email that I sent asking - How do you submit your scores? When can we expect medals?, and when can we buy the dog? OR an update to include dog or medals! ##1yr on and still no update, uninstalled it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its so slow
reviews.comment: The shooting is too stucky. Is it so hard just to copy crazy chicken (moorhuhn jagd)?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: It\'s not as fun as it seems. To people who r reading this do not waste your time with this game. And to the creators y does it keep crashing. FIX IT PLEASE!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Jefferson Tishanae

reviews.title: Impossible
reviews.comment: I like the impossible difficulty level. Haahaa. I got my strategy when Playing it. Just click or shot the place where the fast bird will exactly go. I know its hard to understand, but try it! Really addictive.  I am going to give it The coolest game Award. Nyahahah.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Laggy piece of crap. Even if it was faster it wouldnt make up for the stupid designs. Dont install this waste of time&space.

reviews.comment: Love the blitz stage
